name: Orbital Loop
description:
A Game Created For Ludum Dare 47

CLICK HERE : ORBITAL LOOP LUDUM DARE PAGE

Theme : Stuck In The Loop

Description : This game is about a asteroid which is rotation around a point you have to save it form colliding with asteroids and get between the gap

Use  UP/DOWN/LEFT/RIGHT For Movement

Author / Programmer / Designer : Pradhuman Suner

Music : oddpotatogifts.itch.io

This Game is Made Using Love2d and Lua
